description:
These little pouches of power bring the heat. With a little shake, these handwarmers do their thing and give you some heat when you need it. They slip easily into gloves, pockets, and anywhere else you need a little toastiness.

  • Contains 4 pairs (8 warmers in total), with each pair in its own re-usable and 100% recyclable outer pouch
  • The AirBarrier™ pouch keeps more air out optimizing the efficiency, so the cozy lasts longer, up to 10 hours
  • Activated by contact with the air (oxidization). Activated warmer can be paused for up to 3 days, by putting them in the resealable outer pouch
  • Made from natural and biodegradable ingredients, meaning you can easily dispose of the pouch’s contents in any compost bin or use them as fertilizer
name: Ignik Hand Warmers (4 Pair Multi-pack)
